channel.title: Exception with new Sicknasty Veng
channel.description:
Many people have had this problem and maybe one of you guys can answer it once and for all =). this is a quote from someone who had the same problem that explains what happens
i did tut right added everthing in right spots, ingame when i cast it it messeges me saying "you activate vengence" i get the graffic then screen sits frozin for a few secs, -connection lost- kicks me off to log in screen, i check the server and it says [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.process(client.java:14850) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]
later on "For ( ; ; )" said
You're getting the null pointers because of the AttackingOn's. Also I still don't get why it's named 'sicknasty vengeance' ... sounds like a bad porno.
(lol) but i dont know what to do about them =(. pleeaassee help. the people at my server will go crazy if the new venge doesnt work. *added on* incase this is useful, here is the link for Sicknasty Venge -- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,242154.100.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2008, 10:46:45 PM[/size][hr]can someone please explain this!? i really need =S i only have 10 minutes till i have to go for the day

item.title: Exception with new Sicknasty Veng
item.dc:creator: @Rage_Of_Ice Rage Of Ice
item.description:
@Rage_Of_Ice wrote:

ohhh ok i understand now. THANX SO MUCH

Read full topic

item.title: Exception with new Sicknasty Veng
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

if (Vengeance >= 1 && hitTimer <= 0 && hitCount <= 5) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = misc.random(20); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; hitTimer = 10; hitCount += 1; }

To

if (Vengeance >= 1 && hitTimer <= 0 && hitCount <= 5 && IsAttacking) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = misc.random(20); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; hitTimer = 10; hitCount += 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: Exception with new Sicknasty Veng
item.dc:creator: @Rage_Of_Ice Rage Of Ice
item.description:
@Rage_Of_Ice wrote:

Many people have had this problem and maybe one of you guys can answer it once and for all =). this is a quote from someone who had the same problem that explains what happens

i did tut right added everthing in right spots, ingame when i cast it it messeges me saying "you activate vengence" i get the graffic then screen sits frozin for a few secs, -connection lost- kicks me off to log in screen, i check the server and it says [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.process(client.java:14850) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]

later on “For ( ; ; )” said

You’re getting the null pointers because of the AttackingOn’s.

Also I still don’t get why it’s named ‘sicknasty vengeance’ … sounds like a bad porno.

(lol)

but i dont know what to do about them =(. pleeaassee help. the people at my server will go crazy if the new venge doesnt work.
